div.p: Good afternoon. We hope you and your families are doing well.

a.title: Go to comments for Community Reminder Update Call - 4/23

img.alt: UPK registration will begin Monday, April 27th and run through Friday, May 8th - 9am-3pm - by appointment only.

a.span: UPK registration will begin Monday, April 27th and run through Friday, May 8th - 9am-3pm - by appointment only.

a.title: Go to comments for UPK registration will begin Monday, April 27th and run through Friday, May 8th - 9am-3pm - by appointment only.

div.p: As you may have heard, Governor Cuomo has extended school closures until May 15...

a.title: Go to comments for MCCSD Community Update Call Friday 4/17

div.p: THE 2020 CENSUS MATTERS… TO OUR SCHOOL DISTRICT. TO OUR COMMUNITY. WE ARE DEPENDING ON YOU TO COMPLETE THE CENSUS SURVEY.

a.title: Go to comments for 2020 Census Information

img.alt: Stay at Home County-Wide Peer-to-Peer Initiative

a.span: Stay at Home County-Wide Peer-to-Peer Initiative

a.title: Go to comments for Stay at Home County-Wide Peer-to-Peer Initiative

div.p: As a follow-up to yesterday’s notice on cancelled June regents and final exams, please be aware of the following additional details and other reminders:

a.title: Go to comments for MCCSD Community Update Call 4/9

img.alt: Regents Examination and Graduation Requirement Questions & Answers

a.span: Regents Examination and Graduation Requirement Questions & Answers

div.p: For Middle School and High School Students: Regents examinations and final examinations have been cancelled, as you know. The following guidelines, which are consistent with the New York State Education Department’s guidance, will apply to Middle Country students:

a.title: Go to comments for Regents Examination and Graduation Requirement Questions & Answers

div.p: Good afternoon from Middle Country School District. Today’s message provides information for middle and high school students and their families.

a.title: Go to comments for Community Update Call 4/8 (Attn:Secondary Students)

div.p: This is a reminder to ALL Middle Country families that we have a Grab and Go free breakfast and lunch meal program at Newfield and Centereach High Schools from 8:00 a.m. through noon.

a.title: Go to comments for Community Update Call 4/7

div.p: Good afternoon from Middle Country Schools. I am calling with two updates: Earlier today, Governor Cuomo announced that schools will be closed until April 29th .

a.title: Go to comments for Community Update Call 4/6
